name: A gun that doesn't shoot
description:
!!!READ ME!!!

Link to bug free version: https://raccoon5.itch.io/balec-aldwin

WASD to move

Mouse to look

Left mouse to Shoot (don't do it before you are ready!)

E to interact

Space to jump

Shift to Run

IMPORTANT NOTICE: (BUGS to avoid) \\\\\////

Second game start you cant leave the room and text "We'll see" appears on the bottom of the screen indefinitely. Just restart the game and you can continue:)

If you click the Left mouse button before acquiring gun then the gun will shoot instantly and you will lose. Don't press the button until you are ready to shoot!
